content: KTH | Mats Brorsson Skip to main content Mats BrorssonProfessorKungliga Tekniska Högskolanhttps://www.kth.se/profile/matsbrorDetailsWorks for Division of Software and Computer SystemsTelephone +46 8 790 41 21Unit address Lindstedtsvägen 30E-mail matsbror@kth.seResearcherResearcher IDORCID IDAbout meProfessor of Computer Architecture. Currently on leave of absence. Main research interests Parallel computing Programming models and their implementations (e.g. OpenMP) System software (e.g. OS, Hypervisors, run-time systems) Energy aware computer architectures and systems Visualization and tool support for performance debugging Professional activities Coordinator of PaPP ARTEMIS project Member of SCALE:  - The KTH-SICS Collaboration in Scalable Computing Systems Scientific production Google Scholar page Microsoft Academic Search page Other contact points Twitter: @matsbrorsson LinkedIn Skype id: matsbror PublicationsPublication listPortfolioThesis projectsAn Extensible Performance Analysis Tool for Dataflow Applications
